title: The Fogbrook Thing
creator_credit: Mark Osborne and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Set in the mid-Sixties, this film accompanies Peter Young on his first camping trip with the Boy Scouts - deep into the bush, into a place of myths and folklore and fearful adventures. (ATOM Award 1987).
creator_credit_for_label: Mark Osborne and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
